attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: HORRIBEL DISGUSTING i say. Worst app in the history of america. It was EXTREMELY confusing and made me have panic attacks many times. I am disgusted by this app.i am mortified and horrified and borrified. AND IT MADE ME CRY MANY TIMES. I AM SO UPSET ABOUT THIS AND I AM EXTREMELY DISSAPOINTED IN THIS APP. George Washington has better apps. This app should be deleted from existence PERIOD 😡

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: So I downloaded to try and stay up to date with all of trumps plans but all it does is crash and it has been lagging my phone if it is in background

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I definitely don’t recommend this app it keeps making my phone crash and taking up a lot of service and making my battery percent die fast this app 0/10

attributes.title: No❤️ but i fwu for trying🥰
attributes.review: this app has a horrible layout and made my phone glitch like crazy. it took 6 days to finish downloading and when i entered the app it started to overheat my phone.

attributes.title: Yeah it’s a no from me
attributes.review: If you dare delete Tik Tok, which has given me so much happiness, all because you’re scared of something that literally nobody with the app actually cares about, then we can delete your stupid app. ❤️🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: You wanna take TikTok we take your app. Try doing something good for America for once. We won’t be silenced!! Black lives matter. Trans lives matter. Mexican lives matter. Women’s lives matter! If this makes me a snowflake winters coming✨🥱

attributes.title: Glitchy and terrible
attributes.review: This app constantly makes my phone die every time I download it and also gives me pictures of an old greasy Cheeto from under someone’s couch ?

attributes.title: Uhhhhggg
attributes.review: I get a notification every 2 sec and it’s literally soooo annoying but the app all takes a while to load and it’s hard to always see what’s happening

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app filled so much space and did seemingly nothing for me and my life. I was hoping Donald would like reward me for downloading his app but he didn’t. Maybe America isn’t great because of him I think I’m voting blue this year.
